headline: HHM Hotels Builds Out Senior Executive Team Hiring Jeremiah Galvin
summary: Hotel Management Company Brings on Veteran Accounting & Finance Executive Jeremiah Galvin Jeremiah Galvin announced as HHM's Executive Vice President, Chief Financial Officer (CFO) Philadelphia, PA, Aug. 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HHM Hotels announced the recent hire of Jeremiah Galvin as its new Executive Vice President, Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Galvin will report to Shawn Tuli and oversee all aspects of the company’s hotel accounting and corporate finance functions. Galvin brings over
